body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_height_length
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.height.v2])
WHERE
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/magnitude>$height
  AND
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/units=$units
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
